summary: The bill, titled the Protecting Americans’ Right To Silence Act of 2025 (or PARTS Act of 2025), is introduced in the Senate. It aims to amend the definitions of "firearm silencer" and "firearm muffler" within section 921 of title 18 of the United States Code. The bill specifies what devices or parts constitute a firearm silencer or muffler, focusing on those designed to reduce the sound of a portable firearm and related components.
